[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]GLIMMER[/font][/heading][/size]
Glimmer, a beautiful bastard sword designed with high standards in mind. Can only be crafted at the skyforge, with slightly altered \"Ebony\" stats, although it is a steel weapon, found under the steel section. With detailed textures, realistic shading and a simple, yet effective, sword design, you have yourself the ultimate monster slaying tool!

[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Details[/font][/size][/heading]
2048x2048 Textures, and a low-poly model. Glimmer is a two- handed/one-handed sword, intended for high level players. Witchers Glimmer has a sliver enchantment which allows quicker slaying of \"dark\" creatures while the regular Glimmer is unenchanted and awaiting the players personal touch. 

-Download the Uncompressed Textures version if you want maximum quality textures with
the expense of some possible stuttering when equipping the weapon.
-Download the Compressed Textures version if you want slightly worse looking textures (only noticeable when close to the weapon) but at the same time removing any chance of getting
equip stuttering.

Future release will include script to rapidly switch between 1-handed and 2-handed wielding. The 1-handed and 2-handed versions are exactly the same size. The 2-handed wielding decreases swing speed, but still keeps it higher than a vanilla greatsword. The 1-handed version has a slight lower swing speed than vanilla swords.

[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Installation[/font][/size][/heading]
To find out how to install or uninstall \"Glimmer\", a simple google search will do the trick. I do not
include instructions here to maintain a \"small\"  mod description. Sorry for the inconvenience.

15.06.2013 - VER 2.7 - Added compressed and uncompressed texture versions. 
Compressed textures fix the slight stuttering when equipping Glimmer ingame.
Added unenchanted versions of Glimmer to the skyforge.

altered reflection, additional texture detail
